name: Carbonara
label: Fat
description: Pasta with Guanciale (a kind of bacon), Pecorino (sheep cheese), Pepper, Salt and Eggs.

comments.comment: Wow! One of the best pasta I ever had!
comments.author: Tobia De Angelis

name: Amatriciana
label: Spicy
description: Pasta with Guanciale (a kind of bacon), Pecorino (sheep cheese), Pepper, Salt and tomato sauce.

comments.comment: Great Pasta... but the original recipe is not spicy!
comments.author: Tobia De Angelis

name: Cacio & Pepe
label: Cheesy
description: Pasta with Pecorino (sheep cheese), Pepper, Salt and Parmigiano Reggiano.

comments.comment: Creamy and somehow salty! Love it!
comments.author: Diego Banovaz

name: Gricia
label: Fat+
description: Pasta with Guanciale (a kind of bacon), Pecorino (sheep cheese), Pepper, Salt. Somehow a Carbonara w/o Eggs.

comments.comment: Please call a medic, I'm having an heart attack!
comments.author: Tobia De Angelis

comments.comment: Please kill me! Grease, grease everywhere!!
comments.author: Diego Banovaz

name: Scogliera
label: Summer
description: Pasta with fresh seafood of every kind

comments.comment: Wow! One of the best pasta I ever had!
comments.author: Tobia De Angelis
